mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(t.hiredate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS hiredate, SUM(CASE WHEN t.country_type LIKE '미국%' THEN t.purchase_total * e.us_exchange WHEN t.country_type LIKE '일본%' THEN (t.purchase_total * e.jp_exchange) / 100 ELSE 0 END) AS purchase_total, SUM(CASE WHEN t.country_type LIKE '미국%' THEN t.now_total * e.us_exchange WHEN t.country_type LIKE '일본%' THEN (t.now_total * e.jp_exchange) / 100 ELSE 0 END) AS now_total FROM test_stock_info t JOIN exchange_rate e ON t.hiredate = e.hiredate GROUP BY TO_CHAR(t.hiredate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(t.hiredate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ASC
select to_char(hiredate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as hiredate from test_stock_info group by hiredate order by hiredate
